00010 int findVariableID(MavenCompiler* c, int namespaceID, int objectID, string variable) {
00011         if(namespaceID < 0 || objectID < 0)
00012                 return -1;
00013         
00014         for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->variables->length(); ++i)
00015                 if(c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->variables->at(i).name == variable)
00016                         return i;
00017         
00018         // can't find it
00019         return -1;
00020 }
